Escaped prisoner Damon Anderson walked through Waikato Hospital in underwear, uncuffed before absconding: witness https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/photo-shows-escaped-prisoner-shimmying-down-pipe-outside-waikato-hospital/AEPM6EH7TNERVGMX2QCG57SHNE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/photo-shows-escaped-prisoner-shimmying-down-pipe-outside-waikato-hospital/AEPM6EH7TNERVGMX2QCG57SHNE/ The video purportedly shows him sliding down from the eighth floor. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 04:00:32 +0000 Spring Hill prisoner Damon Anderson, 48, escaped from Waikato Hospital by shimmying down a pipe while in handcuffs.
